example.eg: Some people believe it is important to preserve traditions.
example.egtrans: 有些人认为保持传统非常重要。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 维持…的原状, 保持…不变

example.eg: In renovating the hotel, we have tried to preserve a sense of its 100-year history.
example.egtrans: 在酒店修缮过程中，我们努力保留其百年历史感。

example.eg: It's important to sterilize your jars properly when making preserves.
example.egtrans: 腌制食品时，要对罐子妥善消毒，这点很重要。

example.eg: In its early days, before low-cost airlines, air travel was the preserve of the wealthy.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 独占的活动, 独享的领域

example.eg: Jane preserved an outward show of indifference, even though she was furious inside.
David preserved the vegetables in brine.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保存（食物），储藏（食物）, 腌制

example.eg: Of course, hunting will never be allowed in the wildlife preserve.
